sentences.sentence: The Sniper was selected recently for use on Harrier GR9s as an urgent operational requirement for aircraft in Afghanistan.

sentences.sentence: Harrier jets roared from the flight deck of HMS Invincible to wrest control of the skies from the invaders’ Mirage fighters.
sentences.translation: 巨大的轰鸣声中，鹞式战机从无敌号航母的飞行甲板上升空，与阿根廷的幻影战机争夺制空权。

sentences.sentence: And for five months of the year in Afghanistan, when the weather is hot, the Tornado can only take off with a similar weapons load to the Harrier.
sentences.translation: 在阿富汗一年中有5个月气候炎热，此时“旋风”式战机就只能携载与“鹞”式战机相同的武器升空。
